flawed_nl_solution:
There are 50 games total because 20 + 10 = <<20+10=50>>50
They need to win 100/3 games because 50 x (2/3) = <<50*(2/3)=100/3>>100/3
The need to win 64/3 more games because 100/3 - 12 = <<100/3-12=64/3>>64/3

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 50. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
